result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
11:15 AM Defendant Sarah Marie Garofalo appeared by phone.  Attorney Alysja Otten in court for Sarah Marie Garofalo.  Prosecuting attorney Kevin Thomas Schmidt in court for the State of Wisconsin. Case on for Status Conference.  Defense attorney updates the Court: counter-offer sent by defense today, negotiations continue.  Offer- plead to poss meth, 2 yrs probation; counter-offer- plead to multiple misdemeanors w/same recommendation.
Status conference scheduled for December 15, 2022 at 10:30 am.
Status conference on December 15, 2022 at 10:30 am.

9:49 AM Defendant Sarah Marie Garofalo appeared by phone.  Attorney Alysja Otten in court for Sarah Marie Garofalo.  Prosecuting attorney Kevin Thomas Schmidt in court for the State of Wisconsin. Def waives her right to appear in person KIV.  Case on for Arraignment.  Defendant acknowledges receipt of information, def. waives reading.  Court informs def. of charges, possible penalties and rights.  NG plea entered to all counts.  Court approves def for Zoom for next hearing.
Status conference scheduled for October 27, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Status conference on October 27, 2022 at 11:00 am.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Prosecutor

records.addlTxt:
1:59 PM Called 22CF167 scheduled for PH.  Attorney Alysja Otten in court for Sarah Marie Garofalo.  Prosecuting attorney Kevin Thomas Schmidt in court for the State of Wisconsin. Attny Otten confirms today will be a WOPH, defense requests for def to appear remotely.  Def logging into zoom. Defendant Sarah Marie Garofalo appeared by telephone at 2:02pm.  Court questions def. Court reviews appearances.  Attny Otten is satisfied that it is the def on the phone.  State has no objections.  Waiver of Preliminary Hearing:  Court informs def of rights to PH; waived by def.  Court finds waiver of right to PH knowingly, freely, voluntarily made.  Court finds factual basis for bind over.  State efiles information which mirrors the criminal complaint.
Arraignment scheduled for September 29, 2022 at 09:30 am.
NOH for 7/26 returned from 1865 Lone Eagle Dr Unit #2, Woodbury, MN 55125 as "No Such Street."
Preliminary hearing on September 8, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

records.addlTxt: 3:06 PM Prosecuting attorney James Jay Rennicke Esq in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Sarah Marie Garafalo not in court. Def fails to appear (was here earlier, but left to speak to the PD and never came back).  State requests forfeiture of bond and warrant.  Court orders $750 cash bond on warrant, orders cash forfeited.
